casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Joseph M. ROMANO 199PA16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. September 19, 2016 Constance E. Widenhouse, Assistant Appellate Defender, for Ramano, Joseph M. Derrick Mertz, Assistant Attorney General, Todd Williams, District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Brief filed on the 19th of September 2016 by State of NC:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 19th of September 2016."

State of NC shall have up to and including the 4th day of October 2016 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court.
